Section.name: About NBKRIST
Section.description:
NBKR Institute of Science and Technology was established in the year 1979. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anatapur and accredited by NBA and NAAC
NBKRIST AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
